## My first page!

**I have my own website now**

Look at this graph

```{r first_graph, fig.width=5}
ggplot(mtcars) +
  geom_point(aes(x=mpg, y=wt, size=hp))

# gcd - r version
gcd <- function(a,b) {
  if (b == 0) {
    return(abs(a))
  } else {
    return(gcd(b, a %% b))
  }
}
c(gcd(5,16),gcd(5,15))

```

I can put python scripts here too!

```{python using_python}
def gcd(a, b):
  if b == 0:
    return a
  else:
    return gcd(b, a % b)

gcd(5,16)
```
